CustomField.description: Save Down Payment value used as reference. Formally, it's corresponding to the calculated value that should be applied for each Down payment sequence (for Ex, 110,000 with 11 sequences give 110,000/11 = 10,000).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Le montant de l'acompte se calcule en fonction du nombre d'acomptes interprété dans la colonne "Période de facturation"
CustomField.label: Down Payment YE Value Reference
